item.title: My Travel Guide to Brno
item.description: Come to the Czech Republic and discover the beautiful city of Brno. I just wrapped up my third visit to the city and I can’t wait to come back! The city is full of history, culture, and delicious food. Here’s my travel guide to Brno! Getting to Brno Brno has an airport, but the flights are limited and sometimes expensive. Some coworkers have found good deals on these flights (especially via Ryanair from London’s Stansted Airport), but I prefer the train.
